text: main ( n ) { int a [ 99 ] [ 99 ] , k , i , j ; scanf ( "%d" , & k ) ; while ( k -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) for ( j = 0 ; j < i + 1 ; j ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; for ( i = n - 1 ; i > 0 ; i -- ) for ( j = 0 ; j < i + 1 ; j ++ ) a [ i - 1 ] [ j ] += m ( a [ i ] [ j ] , a [ i ] [ j + 1 ] ) ; printf ( "%d\n" , a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; } }
